.. _coordinates:

=========================================
Coordinates (``ctapointing.coordinates``)
=========================================

.. currentmodule:: ctapointing.coordinates

The `ctapointing.coordinates` module contains the implementation of coordinate transformations of ICRS/AltAz coordinates
into coordinates in the pointing camera chip plane, and transformations of ICRS/AltAz coordinates into
the frame of the telescope science camera.

API
===

.. automodapi:: ctapointing.coordinates
